author: OzAmram
body:
This is a draft PR for removing the lookup of template records for intermediate magnetic field values from the SiPixelGenError and SiPixelTemplate ESProducers. These records are not currently used and given the labor intensive process required to produce the calibrations, we do not plan on supporting intermediate magnetic field values in the future. 

In conjunction with this PR, these records should be removed from Global Tags as well. 

This proposed change was discussed at a [recent pixel offline meeting](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...OzAmram:Remove_unused_template_tags). 

We do not expect any changes in output.
title: [RFC] Remove unused pixel template records from ESProducers
